CustomField.formula: IF( CASE( WEEKDAY(Start_Date__c), 2, 5 * 8, /* Monday: 40 hours */ 3, 4 * 8, /* Tuesday: 32 hours */ 4, 3 * 8, /* Wednesday: 24 hours */ 5, 2 * 8, /* Thursday: 16 hours */ 6, 1 * 8, /* Friday: 8 hours */ 0 /* Saturday/Sunday: 0 hours */ ) > 0, ( Total_Hours__c / CASE( WEEKDAY(Start_Date__c), 2, 5 * 8, 3, 4 * 8, 4, 3 * 8, 5, 2 * 8, 6, 1 * 8, 0 ) ), 0 )
CustomField.label: Weekly Goal Completion Percent
